message: ⚠️ TERMINOLOGY ERROR: Do not use 'Scan' for the exterior of mail. Use 'Photograph' or 'Image'. 'Scan' implies opening the mail (a paid service).
⚠️ ACCURACY WARNING: Scans (contents) are not free. Exterior photos are free. Ensure distinction is clear.
⚠️ ACCURACY WARNING: We generally offer Check Forwarding, not Direct Deposit. Verify this claim.
⚠️ STYLE VIOLATION: Avoid qualifiers like 'At iPostal1...'. Write AS the brand, not ABOUT the brand.
⚠️ AEO VIOLATION: Avoid filler/rhetorical openers. Start immediately with the definition or value prop.
⚠️ TONE VIOLATION: Avoid hype. Stick to objective, authoritative benefits.
